xyz.kotlout.kotlout.controller

Class ExperimentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.kotlout.kotlout.controller.ExperimentController

  • public class ExperimentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for handling interactions with Experiment objects.

    Has multiple constructors, each with differing reasons for use.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ExperimentController.ExperimentLoadedObserver
      Callback interface for when the experiment is loaded.
      static interface  ExperimentController.ExperimentUpdatedObserver
      Callback interface for when the experiment is updated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExperimentController(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot experimentDoc)
      Initializes the controller from a known DocumentSnapshot object.
      ExperimentController(Experiment experiment, ExperimentType type)
      Initializes the controller and sets the context to an existing Experiment object of known type.
      ExperimentController(java.lang.String experimentId, ExperimentController.ExperimentLoadedObserver loadedObserver, ExperimentController.ExperimentUpdatedObserver updatedObserver)
      Initializes the controller and sets the context to a string that refers to the experiment's document ID in Firestore.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExperimentController

        public ExperimentController(java.lang.String experimentId,
                            @Nullable
                            ExperimentController.ExperimentLoadedObserver loadedObserver,
                            @Nullable
                            ExperimentController.ExperimentUpdatedObserver updatedObserver)
        Initializes the controller and sets the context to a string that refers to the experiment's document ID in Firestore.

        Both observer parameters are optional, and behave differently. If a specific observer is to be ignored, set it to null.

        Parameters:
        experimentId - Document ID of experiment in Firebase
        loadedObserver - Callback to use when experiment has been loaded. (Only called once)
        updatedObserver - Callback to use for whenever the snapshot changes.

      • ExperimentController

        public ExperimentController(Experiment experiment,
                            ExperimentType type)
        Initializes the controller and sets the context to an existing Experiment object of known type.
        Parameters:
        experiment - An instance of Experiment.
        type - Type of experiment

      • ExperimentController

        public ExperimentController(@NonNull
                            com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot experimentDoc)
        Initializes the controller from a known DocumentSnapshot object. This does not require a callback as the document can be automatically processed into an object.
        Parameters:
        experimentDoc - DocumentSnapshot object to build experiment from.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        @NonNull
public static ExperimentController newInstance(@NonNull
                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                         java.lang.String region,
                                                         int minTrials,
                                                         boolean geolocationRequired,
                                                         @NonNull
                                                         ExperimentType type)
        Sets the experiment context with the basic fields needed for a new Experiment.
        Parameters:
        description - The experiment description.
        region - The region where the experiment is conducted.
        minTrials - The minimum number of trials required for the experiment.
        geolocationRequired - If geolocation is required for this experiment.
        type - Type of experiment

      • getExperimentId

        public java.lang.String getExperimentId()
        Gets the document ID of the current experiment object owned by the controller.
        Returns:
        A String stating the ID

      • getExperimentContext

        public Experiment getExperimentContext()
        Gets the current Experiment object owned by the controller.
        Returns:
        An Experiment object.

      • getType

        public ExperimentType getType()
        Get the type of the experiment handled by this controller.
        Returns:
        Type of experiment.

      • publishNewExperiment

        public void publishNewExperiment()
        Publishes a new experiment and adds it to firestore.

      • getTrialsCompleted

        public int getTrialsCompleted()
        Returns the number of trials that this experiment has completed.
        Returns:
        integer value representing the count of experiments.

      • generateCountText

        public java.lang.String generateCountText()
        Generates a standardized string stating how many trials have been completed for this experiment.

        When more than the minimum number of trials have been completed, it will print just the trial count. If less than the minimum number of trials have been completed, it will print both the minimum and current count.

        Returns:
        Formatted string formed from experiment information.

      • publish

        public void publish()
        Publishes an experiment that already exists in Firebase.

      • unpublish

        public void unpublish()
        Unpublishes an experiment that already exists in Firebase.

      • end

        public void end()
        Ends an experiment.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resumes an experiment that was previously ended.

      • addTrial

        public void addTrial(Trial trial)
        Adds a new trial to the experiment context handled by this controller
        Parameters:
        trial - The new trial to add.

      • getListTrials

        public java.util.List<? extends Trial> getListTrials()
        Get a list of trials linked to this experiment.
        Returns:
        List of trials of the correct type.

      • addTrialFromUri

        public boolean addTrialFromUri(android.net.Uri data)
        Creates a trial from a URI and adds it to the current experiment
        Parameters:
        data - Uri which encodes a trial
        Returns:
        true if the trial is valid, false otherwise
